SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Class ClientSocketImpl

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.net.ClientSocketImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, OnAchievedCommonGoalListener, OnAchievedPersonalGoalListener, OnAdjacentTilesUpdatedListener, OnAssignedCommonGoalListener, OnAssignedPersonalGoalListener, OnBoardRefilledListener, OnBoardUpdatedListener, OnBookShelfUpdatedListener, OnChangedCommonGoalAvailableScoreListener, OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener, OnExceptionsListener, OnLastPlayerUpdatedListener, OnMessageSentListener, OnPlayersListChangedListener, OnPlayerStateChangedListener, OnPointsUpdatedListener, OnStateChangedListener, OnWinnerChangedListener, Runnable
public class ClientSocketImpl extends Object implements ClientInterface, Runnable
The ClientSocketImpl class implements the ClientInterface and Runnable interfaces to provide a client-side socket implementation for network communication with the server. It handles sending various network messages to the server and receiving messages from the server.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Field Details

    • oos

      private final ObjectOutputStream oos
      Stream of output objects used to send serialized object to the server.

    • ois

      private final ObjectInputStream ois
      Stream of input objects used to receive serialized object to the server.

    • OPEN

      private boolean OPEN
      Indicates whether the connection is open or not.

      When set to true, it means the connection is open and messages can be sent to the server. When set to false, it means the connection is closed and messages should not be sent to the server.

    • onConnectionLostListener

      private final OnServerConnectionLostListener onConnectionLostListener
      Listener to manage an eventual loss connection scenario

    • serverDispatcher

      private final ServerDispatcherInterface serverDispatcher
      Used to manage correctly eventual client requests for the server

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientSocketImpl

      public ClientSocketImpl(Socket socket, ServerDispatcherInterface serverDispatcher, OnServerConnectionLostListener onConnectionLostListener) throws IOException
      Constructs a new ClientSocketImpl instance.
      Parameters:
      socket - The socket connected to the server.
      serverDispatcher - The server dispatcher to handle incoming server messages.
      onConnectionLostListener - The listener to handle connection loss with the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the input and output streams.

    • nop

      public void nop()
      Sends a "nop" message to the server. This method creates a new instance of the "NopNetMessage" class, representing a no-operation message. If the client's connection is open, the message is written to the output stream using the object output stream. The output stream is then flushed to ensure that the message is sent immediately. If an IOException occurs during the write operation, indicating a connection issue, the "OPEN" flag is set to false, the "onConnectionLost" listener is notified, and the exception is printed to the standard error stream.
      Specified by:
      nop in interface ClientInterface

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the client socket implementation in a separate thread.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
